description: This event will be triggered whenever an aggregation changes its speed.
Indicates the index of each LAG. The index uniquely identifies an LAG and equals
the ifindex value of the master port.
variables.name: HUAWEI-LACP-MIB::hwAggLinkNumber

description: This event will be triggered whenever any port in aggregator is made inactive
Indicates the index of each LAG. The index uniquely identifies an LAG and equals
the ifindex value of the master port.
variables.name: HUAWEI-LACP-MIB::hwAggLinkNumber

description: The SNMP trap that is generated when LACP link is faulty.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-LACP-MIB::hwLacpPortLinkFaultTrap HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwPortIndex i 0

description: The index of a shelf in the device.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex

description: A slot index is used to identify the location of a board in a shelf.
You can locate a board in a shelf according to hwFrameIndex and hwSlotIndex.
For the hwFrameIndex object, refer to hwFrameTable.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex

description: Port index, indicating the physical number of the port on a board.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwPortIndex

description: The SNMP trap that is generated when the port receives the LACP packet normally.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-LACP-MIB::hwLacpPortLinkRecoverTrap HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwPortIndex i 0

description: The index of a shelf in the device.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex

description: A slot index is used to identify the location of a board in a shelf.
You can locate a board in a shelf according to hwFrameIndex and hwSlotIndex.
For the hwFrameIndex object, refer to hwFrameTable.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex

description: Port index, indicating the physical number of the port on a board.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwPortIndex

description: The SNMP trap that is generated when LACP up link switch over.

event.Summary: LACP up link switch over alarm occurred

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-LACP-MIB::hwLacpGroupMacChangeTrap HUAWEI-LACP-MIB::hwOldUpLinkMACAddress s EXAMPL HUAWEI-LACP-MIB::hwNewUpLinkMACAddress s EXAMPL HUAWEI-LACP-MIB::hwAggLinkGroupID i 9999

description: Indicates the old up link mac-address.
variables.name: HUAWEI-LACP-MIB::hwOldUpLinkMACAddress

description: Indicates the new up link mac-address.
variables.name: HUAWEI-LACP-MIB::hwNewUpLinkMACAddress

description: Indicates the aggregation link group ID.
variables.name: HUAWEI-LACP-MIB::hwAggLinkGroupID

description: The SNMP trap that is generated when a port turns into
forwarding state form other state.

event.Summary: Port turned into forwarding state from other state

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-LACP-MIB::hwLacpPortStateForwarding HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwPortIndex i 0

description: The index of a shelf in the device.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex

description: A slot index is used to identify the location of a board in a shelf.
You can locate a board in a shelf according to hwFrameIndex and hwSlotIndex.
For the hwFrameIndex object, refer to hwFrameTable.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex

description: Port index, indicating the physical number of the port on a board.
variables.name: HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwPortIndex

description: The SNMP trap that is generated when a port turns into
discarding state form forwarding state.

event.Summary: Port turned into discarding state from forwarding state

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-LACP-MIB::hwLacpPortStateDiscarding HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwFrameIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwSlotIndex i 0 HUAWEI-DEVICE-MIB::hwPortIndex i 0

You can locate a board in a shelf according to hwFrameIndex and hwSlotIndex.
For the hwFrameIndex object, refer to hwFrameTable.
